remarks: The covers relation implies the less-than relation.  ( ~ cvpss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2011.)
statement:
cvrfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrfval.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
cvrfval.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrlt $p |- ( ( ( K e. A /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ X C Y ) -> X .< Y ) $.
